activities: (a)  personal information from persons purchasing services by credit card on the www.languageline.com website, (b) users of the services, such as hospital patients, who provide personal information during interpretation phone calls, (c) users of the services who request the company to translate documents that contain protected data, and (d)  human resources information of independent contractor interpreters who reside in the United Kingdom and work for our sister company resident in London, England.  All of this information is maintained in secured servers with high level security in place to prevent the use or disclosure of any personal information or other confidential information.  The information is used for internal purposes only and is never disclosed to any third party.
personaldata: credit card information; online user information; customer and client contact information.  None of the data is manually processed
